name: Accessible & Great Private Bedroom Near T!
neighborhood_overview:
This is a quiet, diverse owner occupied residential area, with beautiful Victorian houses and a peaceful park for the neighborhood children and a private elementary school near by that uses the park occasionally. The Red line train is 2-3 minutes walk from the house and it takes 20 minutes to go to downtown Boston.
Its diversity translates into wonderful restaurants along "Dot" (Dorchester) Ave. You'll find Indian, Irish, Vietnamese...just about every type of food you'd want like Ashmont Grill restaurant, Tavolo Restaurant, Dimitrios Restaurant, Starbucks, Duncan Donut and others which are close by on Dorchester Ave.
description:
This Private Room comes with an Airbed, closet, lamp, desk & chair and AC to keep unit nice and cool all summer long. In addition, All common areas are shared w/ students and/or professionals. The house is 2-3 min walk to T, food, market shops near by, 15 min Train ride to JFK/UMASS, 20 min Downtown Boston, 25 min to MGH, MIT, 30 min to Children's hospital, Dana Farber, Harvard Med, Beth Israel, Boston Financial District.

The space
The kitchen and Pantry come with a Refrigerator, Microwave, Stove and Washing Machine and Dryer for laundry.

Guest access
Guests can access all common areas.

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
2) Area is safe and guests can go for walks around the neighborhood.
3) The house also has an outside surveillance camera.
4) There is also "Free Street Parking" 24 hours, No Resident Permit required.
